item.title: Someone help
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Don’t triple post, and here’s your answer it:

Create a new DB than Execute the .sql backup db i made for the source. GL. After than go in your configuration.java in Devias server files and modifie the MYSQL Details. If u just installed leave pass blank, in user put root, in database put the Database name. host (? localhost? )

If you cant get that to work, use Google.
